programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
create principal bob "password"
set x = []
append to x with "one"
append to x with "two"
append to x with "three"
return x
***

as principal bob password "password" do
foreach y in x replacewith y
return x
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
set delegation x admin read -> bob
return "exiting"
***

as principal bob password "password" do
foreach y in x replacewith y
return x
***

as principal admin password "admin" do
set delegation x admin write -> bob
return "exiting"
***

as principal bob password "password" do
foreach y in x replacewith y
return x
***
